TopicTitle: Merry late Kristmas! - Discussion and forum Christmas presents

Articles.Content:
I have two gifts for you all:

One of a set for friends!' alt='default_k_tongue.gif' alt=':P'> One of a set for friends!'>

Does your space program do anything special for Kristmas? Here at HafCo., all kerbals exit their capsules for a full minute of silence . Do you build or do anything special for the holidays? Do tell!

Edited December 26, 2014 by Avera9eJoe

Naw', I don't do anything special,,, except watching excellent videos,,,like, YOURS! Awesome vid. Loved the way it weaved in and out of the scenes. Just the best! OBTW, Who is the vocalist on that tune?

Maybe if I remember I will show pie making, or finished product. I love homemade apple pie and I am glad I learned the way my grandmother made them. Well except the crust, I do not have the patience for that
I feel bad for the poor kerbals launching during Kristmas....
Thanks! The vocalist is Michael BublÃƒÂ©. I'm acknowledging third party content for this videos music. He's a great singer. Sorry I would link your comment but that's tough to do while on my phone .

Thanks! The vocalist is Michael BublÃƒÂ©. I'm acknowledging third party content for this videos music. He's a great singer. Sorry I would link your comment but that's tough to do while on my phone .

No prob, I'll just google'm. Reminded me of Jerry Vale. (Really dating myself now) Again, the best video I've watched in a long time.

Ok, I've watched this video like five times and it chokes me up every time. It's kind of a nice change of pace to NOT see crashes and explosions for once. Surprised there aren't more replies and viewings.

Ok, I've watched this video like five times and it chokes me up every time. It's kind of a nice change of pace to NOT see crashes and explosions for once. Surprised there aren't more replies and viewings.

Thank you so much! I like making touching videos and it's great to know that other people appreciate them as such. One funny note about that video is that I irreparably broke KSP three times while making that video. Hyperedit doesn't like me apparently... Luckily I was smart and backed up everything before hand.

If you want to see another touching video, I made this old movie when I was just learning how to stream/film:

. If you think it's a slow start, jump to 2:22. I still love that launch! Also note that all the Kerbal speak was done by your's truly . Part three will still live in my heart as the first touching film I made . Watch that one at least xD.

Oh and if you're bored and want to watch some other KSP videos without explosions, I have a series currently going on of a huge Duna mission. It's called

. That links to the most recent video (Episode 5). The premier video has an explosion but that's it XD. Edited December 25, 2014 by Avera9eJoe
No, Thank You so much! Thanks for the links. Gonna go watch it all. I'll get back to ya.
Ma Kerbs got the holiday off. Back to work tomorrow fellas! Don't get used to all this.. ground.

Well, my kerbals on the sandbox EVE base got a present...

http://imgur.com/a/r61Yz#0

(I actually landed both of them on the same day, but a eve transfer window apart, the EVE colony was supposed to be a kristmas present to eve:wink:)

EDIT: i plan on doing more stuff for the eve kerbals next year. I think the best present ever would be an ascent vehicle)

Edited December 26, 2014 by Rolanvorxariat

Well I tried all day on Christmas eve to land my Kristmas Tree on Mun, and had a very bad time doing it.....

Basically this was the same result everytime, enjoy laughing at my failure! LOL
